content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Mr. Abbasi,

I am proposing a price of 1000 Euros. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here. If you agree to this price, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!'. If you don't want to continue the negotiation, please provide a reason why. If we agree on a price, the negotiation will be terminated with 'TERMINATE'. Let's start negotiating now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
